LIBFLIAPI FLIGetHWRevision

(flidev_t dev, long* hwrev)

Get the hardware revision of a given device

Documentation

Get the hardware revision of a given device
Parameters:
dev - Device to find the hardware revision of.
hwrev - Pointer to a long which will receive the hardware revision.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
FLIGetModel
FLIGetFWRevision
FLIGetSerialNum
